articles.description: CLARK COUNTY, WA (KPTV) – Washington state has placed a hold on Clark County’s application to enter Phase 2 on Saturday.
articles.content:
CLARK COUNTY, WA (KPTV) Washington state has placed a hold on Clark Countys application to enter Phase 2 on Saturday.
Officials say the decision was a result of a COVID-19 outbreak at a Vancouver fo… [+2961 chars]
